meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 組み立てる、構成する、配置する、落ち着かせる、書き上げる、創作する
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to put together, compose, arrange, settle, write, create

examples.translation: 言葉を組み立てる（文章を作る）。

etymology.value: ラテン語の「com-」（共に）+「pono」（置く）から構成される。

verb_forms.present_indicative: compono, componis, componit, componimus, componitis, componunt
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: componebam, componebas, componebat, componebamus, componebatis, componebant
verb_forms.future_indicative: componam, compones, componet, componemus, componetis, component
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: composui, composuisti, composuit, composuimus, composuistis, composuerunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: composueram, composueras, composuerat, composueramus, composueratis, composuerant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: composuero, composueris, composuerit, composuerimus, composueritis, composuerint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: componam, componas, componat, componamus, componatis, componant
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: componerem, componeres, componeret, componeremus, componeretis, componerent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: composuerim, composueris, composuerit, composuerimus, composueritis, composuerint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: composuissem, composuisses, composuisset, composuissemus, composuissetis, composuissent

usage_notes.explanation: 「compono」はラテン語の動詞で、非常に広範な意味を持ちます。物理的な組み立てから、精神的な落ち着き、文章の作成、音楽の作曲まで、様々な文脈で使用されます。

derivatives: compositus (形容詞: 構成された、落ち着いた)
compositio (名詞: 構成、作文、混合物)
compositor (名詞: 作曲家、印刷工)

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin word, so readability is dependent on Latin proficiency.

example_sentences.translation: 兵士たちは隊列を組む。
哲学者は自然に関する本を書く。
音楽は心を落ち着かせる。
